text: kar sanuk phidk lab neux klab taw (thi xallxhˌ ca thrng rab) nan michı sahrab brrda phu thi kratha khwam chaw tang«cnkrathang meux khwam tay di mayang khn hnung khn dı nı phwk khea læw khea k klaw wa badni hæla kha phraxngkh khx sanuk phidk lab neux klab taw læa k michı sahrab brrda phu thi tay nı khna thi phwk khea pen phu ptiseth sraththa dwy chn hela ni rea di teriym wi læw sahrab phwk khea sung kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb
